Localization.Name: Flight Blade
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Broad & Rabiee
Type: Flight Blade

Unlock the potential of your RSI Scorpius Antares with the PHB Flight Blade from Broad & Rabiee. By re-allocating forward thrust resources, you can expect your ship deliver increased precision handling during tight maneuvers.
